<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create Backup schedules</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/osbackup"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Access and manage OpenStack backup options and configurations.
